item.description:
Website: http://ttakumi.com/...

Cost:
$12 if purchased in advance via the website (English: http://ttakumi.com/hf... , 日本語: http://ttakumi.com/hf...)
$15 at the door

Description: There is an extremely original Haircut Fashion show being put on this this Friday evening by several fashion-savvy Japanese at Cambridge's classic Westernfront Club (thanks to Yutaka Tanno for this find). You will be able to listen to live piano music, enjoy aroma therapy, mingle with the models, view artwork, and a few lucky ladies might even have their hair cut for free (if they win the free raffle) - all while enjoying the atmosphere of the Westernfront Club.

Note: You must be 18 or older to attend this event.

Schedule:
Doors Open: 8 PM
1st Show: 9 PM
2nd Show: 9:50 PM
3rd Show: 11:10 PM
Doors Close: 2 AM

Map: http://www.google.com...

Directions:
Public Transportation: Take the #70 Bus from the Red Line's Central Square Station.
http://www.mbta.com/s... (On the map, "Central" = Central Square Station)

By foot:
From Central Square Station: Head to the corner of Massachusetts Ave and Magazine Street right near the station. Walk down Magazine Street (away from Prospect Street) and bear right onto Western Ave.
http://maps.google.co...
item.name: ~ Haircut Fashion Show ~ 18+
